title: Main equipment of spherical magnetic confinement nuclear fusion reactor
abstract: A main body of spherical, mangetically confined nuclear fusion reactor is composed of spherical superconducting magnetic system, spherical vacuum wall, energy extraction system, tritium multiplication layer, neutron reflection layer, heat insulating layer and shielding layer. Its special spherical magnetic field has strong magnetic confining, strong insulating and compression heating and centralized energy reflection. The deuterium-tritium fusion reaction can be conducted only by ohm heating, or by increasing magnetic field intensity and auxiliary heating. Its advantages are low cost high reliability and convenient maintenance.
claims: 1. a spherical magnetic confinement nuclear fusion reactor main equipment is characterized in that it is to be made of spherical superconducting magnet system (1), vacuum sphere wall (2), energy extraction system (3), tritium proliferative zone (4), neutron reflector (5), heat insulation layer (6), screen layer (7); Spherical superconducting magnet system (1) is positioned at the outermost layer of this device, form by coil (8), Dewar (9), yoke (10) three parts, the coil-winding mode has two kinds, 1). be sleeved on outside the spheroid (11) with a plurality of hoop coils (12), hyperconductive cable (13) in the hoop coil (12) is arranged in parallel, be arranged in certain angle between each hoop coil (12), form the shearing magnetic field of strong restraint force; 2). with the centre of sphere is the central point of coil-winding, winds the line with the maximum gauge of hyperconductive cable (14) along spheroid (11); Dewar (9) is a kind of spherical multilayer thin-walled pressure vessel, and internal layer is two-phase helium (15), is followed successively by liquid helium (16), vacuum chamber (17) and heat insulator (18) outward, and the yoke (10) of ball wall shape is positioned at outermost layer; The low temperature agent of superconducting magnet system also can be adopted liquid nitrogen; Vacuum sphere wall (2) is the innermost layer wall in the face of centre of sphere plasma (19), vacuum sphere wall (2) is outer to be energy extraction system (3), be to constitute the cooled containers (21) that can inject cooling medium by second layer ball wall (20) and vacuum sphere wall (2), there is fixedly rib (22) do the bar support between vacuum sphere wall (2) and the second layer ball wall (20), and cooled containers (21) is divided into the cabin (23) of a plurality of intercommunications, make cooling medium each cabin of flowing through, cooled containers (21) communicates with cooling medium ascending pipe (24), cooling medium efferent duct (25); Second layer ball wall (20) is outer to be the tritium proliferative zone (4) of ball wall shape, with lithium, beryllium is tritium-breeding material, tritium proliferative zone (4) outside is to make ball wall shape neutron reflector (5) with high purity graphite, neutron reflector (5) outside is the ball wall shape heat insulation layer made from heat-barrier material (6), and heat insulation layer (6) outside is the screen layer (7) and the superconducting magnet system (1) of ball wall shape.

2, device according to claim 1 is characterized in that this device can be divided into the hemisphere of two symmetries, is connected with groove (33), the protruding O-ring seal of gasket seal (34) (35) between episphere (31) and the lower semisphere (32) and seals; The Dewar (9) of episphere (31) and lower semisphere (32) is two independently seals; Be connected with cable socket (44) by cable plug (43) between episphere coil (8) and the lower semisphere coil (8).

3, according to the described device of claim 1.2, it is characterized in that this device cooled containers (21) can be made into two independently seals, cooled containers on the branch (37) and following cooled containers (38), two cooled containers have independently cooling medium ascending pipe and cooling medium efferent duct respectively.

4, according to the described device of claim 1.2, it is characterized in that on the episphere (31) of this device and the lower semisphere (32) fixed mount (36) being arranged respectively, fixed mount (36) links to each other with spheroid (60).

5, device according to claim 1 is characterized in that this device can install air core transformer additional, and the elementary winding (30) of transformer places in the superconducting magnet system (1), and the coil-winding mode of transformer is identical with superconducting magnet coil (8).

6, device according to claim 1 is characterized in that the vacuum sphere wall (2) of this device is gone up the low Z material of covering one deck, as beryllium, carbon, beryllia, boron carbide, silit.
